nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Rebel Power! (originally titled Heroes of Lothal) is a Dorling Kindersley children's book in the Star Wars Rebels series. It was written by Lauren Nesworthy and edited by Anant Sagar, and published in the United States on July 7, 2015.
Discover all there is to know about the heroes from the planet Lothal, including Ezra, Hera, and Chopper.
